src:
LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKET 04: Bavarska dupla pobeda na vidiku
Sigurizze na kvoti 16,00 samo u MOZZARTU

06 Nov 2019

Čist kladilački hedonizam čeka vas na LIGA PAMPIONA TIKETU 04 do 18.55 časova. Nema baš puno vremena istina je da trknete do najbližeg MOZZARTA, ali svakako ima i više nego dovoljno da uspešno obavite možda i najvažniji kladilački zadatak dana koji umesto standarne kvote 13,24 odlukom vaše omiljene kladionice nosi koeficijent 16,00. Malo li je?


18.55: (1,20) BAJERN (7,25) OLIMPIJAKOS (12,0)



18.55: (5,50) LOK. MOSKVA (3,80) JUVENTUS (1,65)



21.00: (2,55) DIN. ZAGREB (3,25) ŠAHTJOR (2,80)



21.00: (2,80) LEVERKUZEN (3,10) ATL. MADRID (2,65)


Sve što treba da uradite to je da zatražite od vašeg operatera da vam otkuca LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKET 04, ili da se poslužite brzim prstima preko mozzartbet.com aplikacije. Čeka se Bajernova dupla pobeda, zatim da Juve pobedi Lokose na kombinaciji 2&2+, da Dinamo Zagreb i Šahtjor odigraju 3+, te da Aspirinžije i Atletiko Madrid dođu na X2&2+.
Sve je jasno kao dan! DONESI ODLUKU, obezbedi sebi LIGA ŠAMPIONA TIKET 04...


* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
TICKET CHAMPIONS LEAGUE 04: Bavaria double win in sight
Sigurizze at odds 16.00 only in MOZZART

06 Nov 2019

Pure betting hedonism awaits you at the PAMPION TICKET LEAGUE 04 to 18.55. Not much time is true to race to the nearest MOZZART, but there is certainly more than enough to successfully complete perhaps the most important betting task of the day, which instead of the standard odds of 13.24, by the decision of your favorite bookmaker, carries a odds of 16.00. Is it small?


18.55: (1,20) BAJERN (7,25) OLYMPIAKOS (12,0)



18.55: (5.50) LOK. MOSCOW (3.80) JUVENTUS (1.65)



9pm: (2.55) DIN. ZAGREB (3,25) SHAKHTOR (2,80)



9pm: (2.80) LEVERKUZEN (3.10) ATL. MADRID (2,65)


All you have to do is ask your operator to type your TICKET CHAMPION LEAGUE 04, or use your quick fingers through the mozzartbet.com application. Bayern's double win awaits, then Juve defeats Lokos by a combination of 2 & 2 +, Dinamo Zagreb and Shakhtar play 3+, and Aspirinzhia and Atletico Madrid come to X2 & 2 +.
Everything is clear as day! BECOME A DECISION, PROVIDE YOUR CHAMPIONSHIP TICKET 04 ...


* Odds are subject to change
